document_data.name: Ullu Lake
document_data.mainbody: '''Ullu Lake''' was a lake in the [[Angalpuk]] region of the [[Great Glacier]].
document_data.Description: Ullu Lake was a freshwater lake with an average depth of {{SIrange|5|20|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Geography: Ullu Lake was located in eastern Angalpuk next to the [[Angsaas Chain]].
document_data.Flora & Fauna: The lake was a dangerous place because of the high number of [[polar bear]]s, who frequently hunted for fish in the lake's waters.
